title: Drawing, "Vanity", early 20th century
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink at lower left: DONALD DESKEY/ 501 MADISON AVENUE/ NEW YORK CITY; Stamp in black ink at lower right: DONALD DESKEY/ 501 MADISON AVENUE/ NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite in lower right corner: SCALE 1"=1'0", #7690/48# [circled]; lower left in graphite: 9; lower right in red color pencil: P; dimensions and instructions in graphite.
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawing of long, rectangular vanity table. Two sides on top of table curve upward, and base/legs curve downward. Top and base of table in sycamore. Three drawers between top and base with rectangular pulls; large drawer at center on one side, and two smaller drawers on the ends on the opposite side. Drawers in white laquer.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Vanity", early 20th century.
early 20th century. Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-1300.
